article_title: Free X-ray screenings for breast cancer needed despite ACA, advocates say

article_metadata.description: It’s not the most pleasant experience, but it’s free, and it gives Cathy Solomon peace of mind, so the Springfield resident sought out the Mammogram Mondays program again this year.“I’m just thankful,” Solomon, 52, said Monday morning before she underwent a free X-ray of her breasts to check for cancer at St. John’s Women’s Center, 1100 Lincolnshire Blvd.“This is a great program — it’s for people who work but whose jobs just
article_metadata.author: Dean Olsen, Staff Writer
